body_html:
When I try conda create -n tensorflow-gpu python=3.5.4
it throws the error 'CondaValueError: prefix already exists: C:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow-gpu'
After, activate tensorflow-gpu , this ipython or spyder fails to import tensorflow while console does it similar to OP's issue. Any idea why? (decided to add this as an issue #16379)
body_text:
When I try conda create -n tensorflow-gpu python=3.5.4
it throws the error 'CondaValueError: prefix already exists: C:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow-gpu'
After, activate tensorflow-gpu , this ipython or spyder fails to import tensorflow while console does it similar to OP's issue. Any idea why? (decided to add this as an issue #16379)
body:
When I try `conda create -n tensorflow-gpu python=3.5.4`
it throws the error 'CondaValueError: prefix already exists: C:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow-gpu'
After, `activate tensorflow-gpu` , this ipython or spyder fails to import tensorflow while console does it similar to OP's issue. Any idea why? (decided to add this as an issue https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/16379)
